PROJECTS TAKEN.Description: Developed a popular add-on for Dropbox to overcome the limitation of Dropbox to allow only a single folder to sync. Built using Microsoft .NET, it allows you to seamlessly sync any folder outside the Dropbox folder. Recorded over 500,000 downloads till date and got featured in several international magazines such as Lifehacker, The Hindu, PC World, FastCompany etc.

The inception of the idea to develop such a feature took birth from the necessity of providing a proper geographical route-map to various academic and non-academic installations present in the vast and lustrous campus of IIT Guwahati. 

The features, now hosted on the website, has been useful to several campus residents and visitors on numerous occasions. The Campus Map project offers the users twelve exciting features, which were incorporated to provide a clean, user friendly interface,  which combine to give a great experience.
Developed a snazzy chrome extension with simple and intuitive interface to get the latest updates from IIT-Guwahati Newsgroups.
